overview: Genius composer Richard Wagner is awoken in purgatory, 150 years after his death in 1883. His Enlightenment-inducing Music set to be forgotten for the rest of time unless he can answer for charges of inciting WWII with his anti-Semitic writings, intense connection to the best elements of German culture, his secret LGBT life and other transgressions which were part of his unique creative process.
title: Twilight Of The Possible Immortals
